title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 December 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (05/12/2008 00:11): Design.XWiki Query Language Specification was modified by xwiki:XWiki.amelentev (Add more examples) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/XWiki+Query+Language+Specification  
xwikibot - (05/12/2008 00:41): Design.XWiki Query Language Specification was modified by xwiki:XWiki.amelentev (Add JQPL reference and JPQL extensions) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/XWiki+Query+Language+Specification  
xwikibot - (05/12/2008 00:54): Design.XWikiQueryLanguage was modified by xwiki:XWiki.amelentev (Add note about $xwiki.queryManager.xwql) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/XWikiQueryLanguage  
xwikibot - (05/12/2008 01:01): Design.XWiki Query Language Specification was modified by xwiki:XWiki.amelentev (add note about short form queries) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/XWiki+Query+Language+Specification  
xwikibot - (05/12/2008 05:08): Main.ShortURLs was modified by xwiki:XWiki.Sergiu (Warn about the change from xwiki.defaultactionpath to xwiki.defaultservletpath) - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ShortURLs  
xwikibot - (05/12/2008 09:32): XWiki.Kishorsm was modified by XWiki.Kishorsm (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Kishorsm  
xwikibot - (05/12/2008 13:52): Applications.ImportExportApplicationDownload was modified by xwiki:XWiki.LudovicDubost - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Applications/ImportExportApplicationDownload  
asyd - (05/12/2008 13:52): \\_o<  
xwikibot - (05/12/2008 13:53): Applications.ImportExportApplicationDownload was modified by xwiki:XWiki.LudovicDubost - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Applications/ImportExportApplicationDownload
